metadata.title: Farmland sales under returns and price uncertainty

data_sources.source_name: Committee of Land Valuation Experts in Lower Saxony (Oberer Gutachterausschuss für Grundstückswerte in Niedersachsen, OGA)
data_sources.description: This dataset contains sale transactions of arable land in Lower Saxony between 2005 and 2018. It includes information on the price, size, seller, buyer, date of transaction, and location. The data was used to derive the volume duration, which is the number of days until a specific percentage of land per county was sold. The study focused on 1% volume duration, with robustness checks for 0.5% and 1.5%.
data_sources.access_conditions: Data provided by the Committee of Land Valuation Experts in Lower Saxony

assessment.findability_reason: The dataset is mentioned in the publication but lacks a direct link or DOI for easy access.
assessment.accessibility_reason: Access is restricted and likely requires permission from the Committee of Land Valuation Experts in Lower Saxony.
assessment.interoperability_reason: The data format is not specified as interoperable with other systems or standards.
assessment.reusability_reason: The dataset's reusability is limited due to restricted access and lack of detailed metadata or licensing information.
